title: Marketing Assistent (m/w)
description:
MOBIS Parts Europe N.V.
Branch Germany

We are the official distributor of Spare Parts and Accessories for KIA and HYUNDAI Motors in Central and Eastern Europe.

Currently we are looking to fill a vacancy for a position in our Marketing Department in order to ensure the smooth communication and strong support to our customers, receiving spare parts on behalf of KIA-Motors and Hyundai Motors.

To support the processes of our new European organisation at our subsidiary in Brehna, we are looking to recruit a:

Marketing Assistent (w/m)

Functional areas:
* Coordination of Marketing Projects
* Campaign and Promotion planning
* Support in Business Planning
* Internal and external communication and presentation
* Reporting

Candidate profile:
* Business administration or commercial training
* Experience with/Identification ability to Automotive business
* Adequate knowledge of MS-Office
* Fluent in spoken and written English
* Strong numeric skills
* High presentation skills
* Good skills in communication and coordination
* Ability to work independently, while having the capacity for teamwork

We offer:
* Salary in line with your experience
* Becoming part of a growing multi-cultural team

For any additional information we like to invite you at our website: http://www.mobis.co.kr.

Thank you for applying to MOBIS Parts Europe N.V. - a growing company within the Automotive sector. Please send us your cover letter, CV and all necessary certificates (email: maren.billian@mobisparts.de).

We aim to respond as promptly as possible to your application, however, due to the high level of CV's we receive, this process can take some time. Please be advised that documents will be treated in the strictest of confidence.

Mrs. Maren Billian
Mobis Parts Europe N.V. Zweigniederlassung Deutschland
Münchener Str. 18
06796 Brehna
Telefon: +49 (0)34 954 906 273
